name: Gnoll Weapon Familiarity
summary: You were taught to be a hunter and a raider.
description:
You were taught to be a hunter and a raider. You are trained with flails, khopeshes, mambeles, spears, and war flails.Gnoll Weapon Familiarity Leads To...

Gnoll Weapon PracticalityTraitsGnoll: Gnolls are humanoids that resemble hyenas.
